name: Sky's The Limit (Bronto Games)
description:
As the tower grows you must climb! Try to avoid the bees on the way up and make sure not to fall off. See how far up you can go! 

This is my entry for KenneyJam22 with the theme of "growth". 

ControlsArrow KeysMovementZ KeyJump/Double JumpX KeyRestart

Some Tips!

  • You can double jump! Especially helpful for getting around falling blocks
  • You can hop on bees for an extra boost
  • Always keep jumping to get that max height up!

music by: https://tallbeard.itch.io/
